title: Boston’s blue-haired celebrity chef chases down dine-and-dasher
text:
Boston’s blue-haired celebrity chef chases down dine-and-dasher 
Published By: Boston.com - Today 
Boston’s celebrity blue-haired chef used his reality show-honed zest for confrontation and chased down a customer who had left without pay... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
